BR_text.BRsummary: opencv2 header not including everything in standard library
BR_text.BRdescription:
Is there a reason why adding #include "opencv2\opencv.hpp" excludes several modules? For example using the stitcher only works if you combine it with the specific header like follows
 <denchmark-code>#include "opencv2/opencv.hpp"
 #include "opencv2/stitching.hpp"
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Since the stitching module is in the core library and not in the contributed modules, my opinion is that it should get included using the opencv.hpp header...

 <denchmark-code>/*
  *      ** File generated automatically, do not modify **

 */
 
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_CALIB3D

 #define HAVE_OPENCV_HIGHGUI
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_IMGCODECS
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_IMGPROC
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_ML
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_OBJDETECT
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_PHOTO
 #define HAVE_OPENCV_SHAPE
